overview:
GexHost provides Personal or Business Web Hosting, the Plans empower your Website on the World Wide Web.

GexHost is a Web Presence Provider (WPP). we have already recognized as a performer and innovator in today’s web hosting business. GexHost is selling quality webhosting services in Karachi Pakistan. Our webhosting servers are located in Florida, USA, to ensure uninterrupted premium quality web hosting services around the globe. GexHost is a leading web hosting service provider in Karachi Pakistan, we offer PHP & ASP based web hosting services in Pakistan at affordable price. GexHost also provides premium web hosting services in many different countries like UK, USA, Canada, Australia, Dubai, India, and also providing our premium web hosting services all over Pakistan. GexHost offers high quality, cheap and reliable web hosting services in Karachi, Hyderabad, Sukkur, Lahore, Multan, Islamabad, Mirpur AJK, Peshawar, Quetta, Faisalabad, and Rawalpindi.

Since 2000, GEXTON has consistently invested in building state-of-the-art internet data centers around the world.Our web hosting services are packed with the features that you won’t find anywhere else. GEXTON proves that saving money doesn’t have to mean compromising service. Support sets us apart from other web hosts. We pride ourselves on offering reliable, prompt and FREE customer support. GEXTON clients can expect support resolution for most issues within 24-48 hours. GEXTON’s number one asset is our growing base of loyal customers. Small and large customers rely on us to provide low cost and reliable hosting services.
